name: Number of training cycles
help: Number of epochs to train the neural network on.

name: Learning rate
help: How fast the neural network learns, if the network overfits quickly, then lower the learning rate.

name: QAT number of training cycles
help: Number of epochs to train the neural network on during QAT step.

name: QAT learning rate
help: How fast the neural network learns during QAT step, if the network overfits quickly, then lower the learning rate.
